Class AeFileAttachmentManager

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeManagerAdapter
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeAbstractAttachmentManager
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.AeFileAttachmentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentManager, IAeManager, IAeProcessPurgedListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AePersistentAttachmentManager
public class AeFileAttachmentManager
extends AeAbstractAttachmentManager
implements IAeProcessPurgedListener

This class implements a file-based attachment manager.

responsePending

public void responsePending(long aProcessId)
Description copied from interface: IAeAttachmentManager
Notifies the attachment manager that the engine is waiting to populate a synchronous response for the given process. Since the response may include attachments, the attachment manager must hold onto any attachments for the process until the engine calls IAeAttachmentManager.responseFilled(long).

Specified by:
responsePending in interface IAeAttachmentManager
Parameters:
aProcessId -
See Also:
IAeAttachmentManager.responsePending(long)
